title: U.N.'s Truce Plan For Aleppo Draws Skepticism
teaser: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad said a U.N. proposal for a ceasefire in Aleppo was "worth studying." NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Syrian journalist Zaina Erhaim about the prospects.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
